price: (14) And We will surely cause you to dwell in the land after them. That is for he who fears My position[652] and fears My threat."
arabic: وَلَنُسۡكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِي وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ
footnotes: [652]- An alternative meaning is "the standing [for account] before Me."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walanus'kinannakumu al-arḍa min baʿdihim dhālika liman khāfa maqāmī wakhāfa waʿīdi
translations: And surely We will make you dwell
